item.title: How do i indent my code? getting compiling errors
item.dc:creator: @X_Screech_X X Screech X
item.description:
@X_Screech_X wrote:

When I go to add something, it is not indented like the rest of the code. in my client.java… How do you indent it?

Indent ex: I’ll try to add a shop…

[code][Add under the ‘}’ after ‘WanneShop = 2;’ in client.java]
else if (NPCID == 520) {
PutNPCCords = true;
WanneShop = 30;
}

[Add in shops.cfg]
30 Shop! 1 1 1377 1000

[Add in autospawn.cfg]
520 0000 0000 0 0 0 0 0 1 A_Shop![/code]

} else if (NPCID == 553) { // Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; // Aubury Magic Shop } else if (NPCID == 554) { // Gilded Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 48; // Gilded Shop } else if (NPCID == 550) { // Range Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 49; // Range Shop } else if (NPCID == 520) { // Member Shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 50; // Member Shop } else if (NPCID == 1699) { // Pure Shop PutNPCCoords = true;

As you can see the difference… When I try to add something, I get errors, I know, I sound nooby at Java… Whatever…
